title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl. Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2015)
description:
In theaters: June 12th, 2015

Description:

Winner of the Grand Jury Prize and the Audience Award at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival, Me and Earl and the Dying Girl is the uniquely funny, moving story of Greg (Thomas Mann), a high school senior who is trying to blend in anonymously, avoiding deeper relationships as a survival strategy for navigating the social minefield that is teenage life. He even describes his constant companion Earl (RJ Cyler), with whom he makes short film parodies of classic movies, as more of a "co-worker" than a best friend. But when GregÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s mom (Connie Britton) insists he spend time with Rachel (Olivia Cooke)Ã¢â‚¬â€a girl in his class who has just been diagnosed with cancerÃ¢â‚¬â€he slowly discovers how worthwhile the true bonds of friendship can be.

Director: Alfonso Gomez-Rejon

Writers: Jesse Andrews

Actors: Thomas Mann, Olivia Cooke, RJ Cyler, Nick Offerman, Molly Shannon, Jon Bernthal, Connie Britton

Genre: Drama

Run Time: 1 hour 44 minutes
